title: SY23, N2: Notices of 5 and 10 day student unexcused absences and notices of truancy intervention services

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

records sufficient to show the number of notices sent to schools of students who have 5 and 10 days of unexcused absences by school and by month for the 2022-2023 school year, issued by schools in network two.

records sufficient to show the number of notices sent "pupil's parent or guardian a letter, by certified mail, return receipt requested, notifying the parent or guardian that he or she is subjecting himself or herself to truancy intervention services", by school and by month for the 2022-2023 school year issued by schools in network two.

By network two shools, i mean the following school:
BRENNEMANN
CHAPPELL
COONLEY
COURTENAY
DECATUR
DISNEY
FIELD
GALE
GOUDY
HAYT
JAMIESON
JORDAN
KILMER
MCCUTCHEON
MCPHERSON
MOSAIC
NEW FIELD
RAVENSWOOD
STONE
SWIFT
WATERS

Please note that I am not seeking any personally identifiable information or otherwise exempt information. As required by the statute, please ensure that the requested documents are redacted rather than exempting the entirety of the document. Additionally, for any and all exemptions used to redact exempt information, please provide clear and convincing evidence for each exemption used by your agency.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Forest Gregg

title: Inquiry about Jacobs and City of Reno’s interractions

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

(1) emails, texts, or written communication between Jeffrey Jacobs, Jacobs Entertainment staff, their subsidiary Reno Real Estate Development LLC staff, Reno Property Manager LLC, and City of Reno staff and officials. Our timeline is from 2016 to current day. 

(2) Conditional use permits and Building permits, gaming permits, and demolition permits filed from Jacobs Entertainment staff, Jeffrey Jacobs,  Reno Real Estate Development LLC staff, and Reno Property Manager LLC, from 2016 to current day. 

(3) emails, texts, or written communication between Jeffrey Jacobs, Jacobs Entertainment staff, their subsidiary Reno Real Estate Development LLC staff, Reno Property Manager LLC, and CIty of Reno staff and officials from 2001 to current day. Key words are “Cares Campus”, “Affordable Housing”, “Neon District”, “Neon Line”, “Homelessness”, “Homeless”, “Weekly Motel”, “Addicts”, “Bench”, “Tourism”, “Alicia Barber”, “Sans”, “Casino”, “J Resort” or “Ammenities”. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Quay Skankey
